mean_metal_log_z¶

cosmerge.sfh.mean_metal_log_z(z, Zsun=0.017)¶

Mass-weighted average log(metallicity) as a function of redshift From Madau & Fragos (2017)

Parameters
zfloat or numpy.array

redshift

Zsunfloat or numpy.array

metallicity of the sun NOTE: Madau & Fragos assume Zsun = 0.017

Returns
log_Zfloat or numpy.array

log(mean metallicity)
